title: Sup Main just hit 30 on a fresh acc - LF Low plat/Mid gold ADC main for duo!
body:
So ive been playing league for some time, but usually just on my brothers acc.
Ive just hit level 30 and as a support main i'm looking for an ADC main before i hit the ranked scene again. (must main adc)
Low plat / Mid Gold rank 
(happy to play normals to showcase my supports)

Mains: Thresh, Janna, Lulu, Blitz, Soraka {{champion:412}} {{champion:40}} {{champion:117}}  {{champion:53}} {{champion:16}} 

Add me - IGN: 
Feminist Fanboy

Voice chat / Non Toxic player

replies.body:
Still looking for a ADC main duo.
- Hit me up in game or here on the fourms -

cheers
